column4: are you able to get the disk to spin? is it making any noise? have you run fsck?
It runs fine I am using it right now actually. It reads fine.. for most things. I can't move the panels around though so maybe it can't right to that specific config file
from a live cd run fsck/chkdsk based on your filesystems.
hope you have a backup of most of what is in there just in case.
